descriptions.en: This move effect may be in need of research. Reason: Can a move be instructed that has since been forgotten?Interactions with Copycat, Mirror Move, Spite, Conversion 2, Sketch, Mimic, Counter/Mirror Coat, Disable; Encore (might be a special case!); GrudgeYou can discuss this on the talk page.
descriptions.de: Lässt das Ziel die zuletzt von ihm ausgeführte Attacke erneut ausführen.
